price: Onlar tuzak kurdular. Biz de –onlar fark etmeksizin- bir tuzak kurduk.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
